objectDesc.note: Hand of Gwilym Wasta. There is no Laws of Court in this manuscript, and there are several gaps in the text.

fileDesc.editionStmt: Bespoke encoding of text drawn from Luft, Peter and Smith (2013), ‘Rhyddiaith gymraeg 1300-1425’.URL:http://www.rhyddiaithganoloesol.caerdydd.ac.uk.

teiHeader.profileDesc: This encoding represents the text of Cyfraith Hywel referred to as Tr in the Blegywryd redaction.
